title: info on typographers
content:
hey,

i'm doing some quick research on typographers and i was wondering if anyone knew any good resources. i'm looking up: Saul Bass, Robert Brownjohn and Seymour Chwast. If anyone knew any good books I could look into that would amaz-ing.

thanks!
author: nikimelon

comments.content: Something about Saul Bass was just [posted on Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019055224/http:/typographica.org/001110.php). You may have already seen that, but nevertheless. :)
Robert Brownjohn: Sex and Typography. I found very good.

American Type Design & Designers by David Consuegra

If you find anything better. Please let me know.

Thank you so much everyone for your great references!! It's been a huuuge help!

Niki
As for Seymour Chwast, there is a book about his work, although it appears to be out of print: _The Left-Handed Designer_. You might find it in a library.
